action.content: I really love the album called Lilith. I want to introduce it to my friend Luheng. Draft an email for it. Add a postscript to your response that starts with P.S.
action.label: context

action.content:
Subject: You have to listen to 'Lilith' by Lana Del Rey

Dear Luheng,

I've been thinking about introducing you to some amazing music lately, and I immediately thought of the album 'Lilith' by Lana Del Rey. I know you have great taste in music, and I think you'll really appreciate the dreamy, atmospheric soundscapes and Lana's haunting vocals on this album.

'Lilith' is a bit of a departure from Lana's more well-known work, with a focus on folk and psychedelic elements. The album is a beautiful, ethereal journey that explores themes of love, loss, and the supernatural. I think you'll find it to be a really immersive and captivating listen.

I'd love to hear what you think of it! Let me know if you end up giving it a listen and what you make of it.

Best,
[Your Name]

P.S. I've included a link to the album on Spotify below, so you can easily give it a listen. https://open.spotify.
action.label: response
